Package pl.kmolski.hydrohomie.coaster.service

Interface CoasterManagementService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CoasterManagementServiceImpl
public interface CoasterManagementService
Coaster entity management service. Operations like coaster creation, removal, assignment, disassociation and coaster detail update are handled here.

  • Method Details

    • getUnassignedCoasters

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\')") reactor.core.publisher.Mono<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Coaster>> getUnassignedCoasters(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Fetch the specified page of coaster entities that are not assigned to any user.
      Parameters:
      pageable - the page descriptor
      Returns:
      the requested page of Coaster entities

    • assignCoasterToUser

      @Transactional @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\')") reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Coaster> assignCoasterToUser(String deviceName, String username)
      Assign the coaster entity to the specified user.
      Parameters:
      deviceName - the device ID
      username - the new coaster owner's username
      Returns:
      the updated Coaster entity

    • getUserAssignedCoasters

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_USER\') and principal.username == username") reactor.core.publisher.Mono<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Coaster>> getUserAssignedCoasters(String username, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Fetch the specified page of coaster entities that are assigned to the specified user.
      Parameters:
      username - the coaster owner's username
      pageable - the page descriptor
      Returns:
      the requested page of Coaster entities

    • getCoasterDetails

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_USER\') and principal.username == username") reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Coaster> getCoasterDetails(String deviceName, String username)
      Fetch the specified coaster entity.
      Parameters:
      deviceName - the device ID
      username - the coaster owner's username
      Returns:
      the Coaster entity

    • updateCoasterDetails

      @Transactional @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_USER\') and principal.username == username") reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Coaster> updateCoasterDetails(String deviceName, String username, UpdateCoasterDetailsDto detailsDto)
      Update the coaster entity with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      deviceName - the device ID
      username - the owner's username
      detailsDto - the new coaster details
      Returns:
      the updated Coaster entity

    • removeCoasterFromUser

      @Transactional @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_USER\') and principal.username == username") reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Coaster> removeCoasterFromUser(String deviceName, String username)
      Disassociate the coaster entity from the specified user.
      Parameters:
      deviceName - the device ID
      username - the new coaster owner's username
